amendment.description: To require the Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to conduct a study to assess voluntary community-based flood insurance options.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2703 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2703 proposed by Senator Reed.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2703 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2703 proposed by Senator Reed.
